Author: BigTangle
Title: [ANN] BigTangle - decentralized cryptocurrency, payment, exchange, supply chain
Body: BigTangle Website Whitepaper  The BigTangle is a decentralized cryptocurrency, payment, exchange, supply chain and e-commerce platform.  BigTangle is a cryptocurrency network with intrinsic token BIG extending the directed acyclic graph (DAG) architecture Tangle. It combines feeless, low latency transactions with scalability and mining. Through the use of industry standard big data technology (Spark, Kafka, etc.) in conjunction with the parallelizable Tangle architecture, it is intended for nodes to run on computer clusters, removing single machine limitations. BigTangle employs a Proof-of-Work-based DAG mining process to introduce inflation and network validation incentives. The transaction consensus is achieved in a completely decentralized manner and does not rely on any centralized instances. Finally, custom token self-issuances, also known as "Colored Coins", and smart contracts are supported to enable leveraging the network capabilities through a number of economic key use cases.  Properties     Fully feeless transactions       Performing transactions only requires validation of other transactions plus very light Proof of-Work     Near infinite scalability       Under the assumption of sufficiently powerful nodes, the Tangle base architecture can scale to near infinite transactions per second due to its asynchronous nature.     Low transaction confirmation time       The transaction confirmation time scales logarithmically with the transaction throughput and stays in the range of seconds for millions of transactions per second.     Permissionless, trustless, decentralized       Network participation is completely permissionless, resulting in a fully decentralized and trustless network.     ~2% inflation per year       Inflation through the mining process is (proposed to be) set to 2% of the initial total supply.     Low variance mining       Due to the DAG structure, BigTangle moves away from the "winner-takes-it-all" mining of traditional blockchains.       Instead, most of the honest transactions are rewarded through the mining process.     Custom token self-issuance       BigTangle allows for custom issuance of tokens, e. g. any network participant can create new tokens that can be transferred.     UTXO model and Bitcoin's stack language Script       BigTangle uses Bitcoin's Unspent Transaction Output (UTXO) model and their input / output scripts.       This allows BigTangle to provide at least the same functionality as Bitcoin.     PoW hashing algorithm       To prevent problems arising from light Proof-of-Work and specialized mining hardware, the Equihash Proof-of-Work algorithm is considered.       Do note however that this is not final and may be changed.     Extends Tangle base architecture       BigTangle uses the DAG base architecture called Tangle.       It is a DAG structure where every block references two previous blocks and confirms the validity of all (directly or indirectly) referenced blocks.          You can check out the white paper and a prototype feature test wallet on our website.

Author: BigTangle
Title: [ANN] BigTangle - decentralized cryptocurrency, payment, exchange, supply chain
Body: Sorry for the long silence, we have been working on the project and have updated the website with new information. For those waiting for the source code, we are still working on it. Release will be soon!  We are now running an Airdrop to raise awareness in our project and increase the community. It works as follows: You can participate via your WeChat account bound to your mobile phone number. You will receive coins for participating and an equal amount of coins for successful referrals, so feel free to let others know of this program. You can also use these coins in the Testnets that are running, so go ahead and try it out / offer feedback if you'd like. Check it out here: https://medium.com/@big_tangle/bigtangle-airdrop-c84590aabdb0  Lastly, we plan on releasing several new Medium posts on our project's vision and mechanisms to improve understanding and awareness of the project. Stay tuned for more updates!

Author: Mrbee
Title: [ANN] BigTangle - decentralized cryptocurrency, payment, exchange, supply chain
Body: Interesting! I have one question for you though, I don't quite understand how do I make money off of your project? Do I just purchase tokens and wait for the price to skyrocket? Sorry if this is a dumb question, I'm fairly new to all of this.

Author: BigTangle
Title: [ANN] BigTangle - decentralized cryptocurrency, payment, exchange, supply chain
Body: Yes, you can go ahead. For anything else, you can PM us.  Quote from: Mrbee on August 25, 2018, 07:44:20 AM Interesting! I have one question for you though, I don't quite understand how do I make money off of your project? Do I just purchase tokens and wait for the price to skyrocket? Sorry if this is a dumb question, I'm fairly new to all of this. Basically, you have three options: 1. Purchase tokens and wait as you said. 2. Run miners/nodes after MainNet release. 3. Promote BigTangle via the Airdrop program. By successfully referring participants, you will receive additional Airdrop rewards. See the previous post.

Quote from: DeepestOnion on August 26, 2018, 04:49:57 PM Less than one page of thread after almost 2 months? Not a rocking start I would say. Does the BigTangle project still stand? I admit we might have been overzealous with the announcements. We were and are still working on the project, and we will continue working on it regardless of any current lack of public awareness.
